Instance.description: Zone Director for apartments owned by the active household.

TunableList.name: neighbor_reaction_events
TunableList.description: A map of different neighbor reaction event listeners that we want to keep active on the Sims while this zone director is running and the situations to create when those event listeners are completed.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The aspiration that we will register on all of the active household Sims that when completed will then trigger the appropriate situation.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Extra data for this specific aspiration.

Tunable.name: situation
Tunable.description: The Situation that we want to start on the completion of this aspiration.

Tunable.name: timeout
Tunable.description: The amount of time in Sim Minutes that will pass from the completion of the aspiration before we will start the situation again.
